name: This is Deep
description:
Game Description

In my mind. I swear I have really deep thoughts, I have something to say and you better listen and not mess with anything, don't mess with the visual representation of my thoughts. Are you a troublemaker? Will you do it? Anyway I don't care.

Credits

Game made by:

  • Juan C. Osorio A.

Music: "Dreamcather" under CC 3.0 License
https://www.purple-planet.com

University of Applied Sciences Europe

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai

"Game A Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
